Place PDF.js distribution files here for offline use.

Option A: ESM build (used by default in this app)
- pdf.mjs
- pdf.worker.mjs

Option B: UMD build (older browsers)
- pdf.min.js
- pdf.worker.min.js

You can download from:
https://github.com/mozilla/pdfjs-dist/releases

After placing the files, the in-app PDF viewer will load PDF.js locally and work without network access.
